title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Aquarium of the Bay
directions: at the foot of Pier 39, on the eastern side
hours: Open daily except Dec. 25. Summer hours: 9AM-8PM daily. Most other times M-Th 10AM-6PM, F-Su 10AM-7PM
price: $18 adults; $10 seniors (age 65+) and children (ages 3-11); $50 family (2 adults, 2 children). Children under 3 free
content: A nice place and the right size for kids, with an underwater tunnel, where the fish swim above you as you gaze at them, and ponds where you can touch various live marine animals. It's a perfectly decent aquarium, but many locals would recommend you save your money for the fantastic California Academy of Sciences in [[San Francisco/The Avenues|Golden Gate Park]].
